abstract: The agreement will bring daily league highlights, new original series and access to some live games to Verizon’s mobile video streaming service Go90.
snippet: The agreement will bring daily league highlights, new original series and access to some live games to Verizon’s mobile video streaming service Go90.
lead_paragraph: Verizon Communications has signed a content and marketing partnership with the National Basketball Association that will bring daily league highlights, new original series and access to some live games to its new mobile video streaming service Go90.

headline.main: Verizon and N.B.A. Form Partnership for Go90 Content
headline.print_headline: Verizon and N.B.A. Form Partnership for Mobile Content
